quest.name: Laying the Foundation
journal: Minfilia has a mind to dispatch you to Revenant's Toll.

* This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Minfilia at the Waking Sands.

※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.

Slafborn is pleased that you were the Scion chosen to represent the order in Revenant's Toll, and waggishly declares that he intends to impose the work of a dozen men upon you. Though he subsequently claims to be jesting, his wry expression leads you to suspect that your time in Mor Dhona will not be spent in idleness...
objectives: * This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Minfilia at the Waking Sands.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Do you ever wonder how he does it? Alphinaud, I mean. It was almost predictable that he should appear with an emissary of the Adventurers' Guild mere moments after I had expressed the need to forge ties between our organizations. Truly, his sense of timing rivals even your own...

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Setting such mysteries aside for the present─I have two tasks for you.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: First, I would like you to deliver these documents to Slafborn. They concern our forthcoming move. Second─and this is the more onerous task─I would have you place yourself at his disposal, in accordance with the agreement between ourselves and the Adventurers' Guild. Represent us well, Forename.

dialogue.name: SLAFBORN
dialogue.text: I was told to expect a Scion, but I didn't expect it to be you. It has been far too long, Forename. You have something for me, yes?

dialogue.name: SLAFBORN
dialogue.text: Let's see, now... Yes, everything appears to be in order.

dialogue.name: SLAFBORN
dialogue.text: You'll be staying with us for a while, yes? Excellent. Would that we had a dozen more like you. Since we don't, though, we'll just give you the work of a dozen men. Heh! I jest, I jest... Well, you'll see soon enough.
